message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident that you'll see the potential and value it offers. I'm willing to let you have it for a price of $1000000. This is a significant discount considering its true worth. What do you say?
